actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration  of the opening of the National Constitution Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, scheduled for July 4, 2003.
short_title: National Constitution Center Commemorative Coin Act of 2002

summary.text: National Constitution Center Commemorative Coin Act of 2002 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue one-dollar silver coins in commemoration of the opening of the National Constitution Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, scheduled for July 4, 2003.

titles.title: National Constitution Center Commemorative Coin Act of 2002
A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration  of the opening of the National Constitution Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, scheduled for July 4, 2003.
